spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room zoning matches (foyer/living left, dining bottom center, pantry core, kitchen right, playroom top-right, stairs/top core). However several openings do not match the 2D plan: multiple doors are missing or left as open wall gaps, and several window runs differ in count/position. Pantry enclosure/entry condition and some room edge proportions (especially pantry/dining edge and right-side exterior wall segmentation) appear distorted vs the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: All major rooms/areas appear present (no obvious missing room volumes), and adjacencies are mostly correct (playroom adjacent to kitchen, pantry adjacent to kitchen, WC/closets by foyer/stairs). Structural fidelity is reduced by missing/incorrectly embedded doors, and some exterior opening/segment layouts that do not follow the plan precisely. Wall thickness looks generally consistent in the render.

furniture_mapping.notes: The 2D plan provides minimal furniture intent, so most placed furniture in the render is unverifiable. Some items appear arbitrary and may conflict with implied circulation/door locations (where doors are missing in 3D). Furniture scale is generally plausible but not grounded to the annotated 2D layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric-style presentation with decent lighting and materials. Camera appears slightly perspective rather than strict orthographic/isometric. Geometry is mostly clean, but missing door geometry and some opening inconsistencies reduce architectural clarity.

detected_errors.description: Main exterior entry door at the foyer (left side) is not modeled as a door; rendered as an open gap/no door leaf.
Kitchen exterior door at the lower-right wall (shown in 2D with a swing) is missing/not modeled in the 3D render.
Pantry door/opening condition does not match the 2D plan (plan shows an enclosed pantry with a defined door; render appears as an open entry/incorrect closure).
Door between dining room and adjacent circulation/kitchen area shows different swing/orientation treatment (2D indicates a hinged door; 3D appears as an open passage/no swing).
Right-side exterior window layout along the kitchen wall differs from the 2D plan (count/spacing/segmentation not matching the plan’s vertical run).
Dining room bottom exterior window set/bay segmentation does not match the 2D plan’s window placements along the dining room projection.
Playroom exterior windows (top and/or right walls) differ in count/placement relative to the 2D plan.
Pantry and adjacent core proportions/wall alignments appear shifted (pantry footprint and its relationship to dining/kitchen edge lines do not precisely preserve the 2D plan geometry).
Hallucinated built element in living room corner (a fireplace/hearth-like mass) is present in the 3D render but is not indicated on the 2D floor plan.
